title: Goodbye Flatlands, Hello Le贸n: Hills, Gothic Cathedrals, and Rustic Bread
excerpt: After days of flat Meseta, the hills returned small, teasing, and glorious. Mansilla de las Mulas, Villarmoros, and finally Le贸n brought a mix of surprises: chocolate-bird shirts, rustic bread, Gothic cathedrals, and aching feet. Today was easier, but tomorrow? Who knows. Only two weeks remain until Santiago.
